trans-unit.source: The following tutorials are available for learning about .NET Core using Preview 3 of the tooling.
trans-unit.target: 下列教學課程可供學習有關使用工具 Preview 3 的 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows/Linux/macOS using the command line (SDK Preview 3)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用命令列在 Windows/Linux/macOS 上開始使用 .NET Core (SDK Preview 3)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild.md)

trans-unit.target: [使用 .NET Core 命令列組織和測試專案 (SDK Preview 3)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild-folders.md)

trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio 2017 在 Windows 上開始使用 .NET Core](using-on-windows-vs-2017.md)

trans-unit.source: [Building a complete .NET Core solution on Windows, using Visual Studio 2017](using-on-windows-vs-2017-full-solution.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio 2017 在 Windows 上建置完整的 .NET Core 解決方案](using-on-windows-vs-2017-full-solution.md)

trans-unit.source: For tutorials about developing ASP.NET Core web applications, we suggest you head over to [ASP.NET Core documentation](https://docs.asp.net).
trans-unit.target: 如需開發 ASP.NET Core Web 應用程式的教學課程，建議您參閱 [ASP.NET Core 文件](https://docs.asp.net)。
